Centralized Design System for The Motley Fool

2020-09-01

The Challenge

The Motley Fool’s digital product suite lacked cohesion and consistency, leading to a fragmented user experience and slower development cycles.

The Solution

Established a centralized design system using Storybook and Figma, enabling consistent styling, efficient handoffs, and alignment across Vue and React environments.

Let's Connect

Feel free to reach out for collaborating or just to say hello.
